code: @Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeStringArray(types).     out.writeStringArray(fields).     out.writeBoolean(includeDefaults).     out.writeBoolean(probablySingleFieldRequest).     OriginalIndices.writeOriginalIndices(originalIndices, out). }

@Override public void readFrom(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     super.readFrom(in).     types = in.readStringArray().     fields = in.readStringArray().     includeDefaults = in.readBoolean().     probablySingleFieldRequest = in.readBoolean().     originalIndices = OriginalIndices.readOriginalIndices(in). }
